purpose: To provide a lightweight and secure environment for running web browsers using unikernels
principle: Utilizes unikernel technology to encapsulate web browsers within minimal operating system environments for improved security and performance
reusability: Can be integrated into systems requiring secure browsing environments by deploying unikernels on supported platforms
limitations: Limited to specific browsers and unikernel configurations; may require specialized knowledge to set up and deploy
name: kernel-images
description: We put browsers on a unikernel
highlight: Runs web browsers on unikernels for lightweight and secure browsing environments
